refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

warning.para: GnomeMDIChildCreator is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.title: gnome_mdi_restore_state ()

warning.para: gnome_mdi_restore_state is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Restores the MDI state. Children are recreated with create_child_func that restores information about a child from a config string that was provided during saving state by the child.

listitem.simpara: A pointer to a GnomeMDI object.
Name of the section to restore MDI state from.
A function that recreates a child from its config string.
TRUE if state was successfully restored, FALSE otherwise.

refsect2.title: gnome_mdi_save_state ()

warning.para: gnome_mdi_save_state is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Saves MDI state to the application's config file in section section.

listitem.simpara: A pointer to a GnomeMDI object.
Name of the section that the MDI config should be saved to.
